results.name: Decimal expansion of Pi^(1/4)/Gamma(3/4).
comment: Entry 34 a of chapter 11 of Ramanujan's second notebook. Entry 34 b is A085565.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Bruce C. Berndt, Chapter 11 of Ramanujan's second notebook, Bull. Lond. Math. Soc. vol 15 no 4 (1983) 273-320.
formula: Also equals Sum_{n=-infinity..infinity} exp(-Pi*n^2), or also EllipticTheta(3, 0, exp(-Pi)). - _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 04 2013
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 15 2010
